word: H7430 - רָמַשׂ - râmas - raw-mas' - Creep - ஊர்

sections.paragraph: to creep, to move lightly, to move about, to walk on all fours (Qal)
1) to creep, to teem (used of all creeping things)
3) to move lightly, to glide about (used of water animals)
4) to move about (used of all land animals generally)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to glide swiftly, that is, to crawl or move with short steps; by analogy to swarm: - creep, move.
Cognate: H7430, H7431
